text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump I think the coronavirus has infected #TraitorTot’s brain. We should probably do a brain biopsy immediately. 

Scalpel!
Magnifying lens!
More light!
Microscope!
Ice cream scoop!
